description-p: Until now I have had a modest journey, I hope in future editions to improve it and fill it with great projects, that only time will tell.

hobbies.info: I like music, listen and compose, my favorites genre are Jpop, Jazz, Rock and Electronic music.
I have practiced different sports, I practiced fencing for a long time and parkour for a short time.
I don't consider myself a strict to eater, but I do appreciate experiencing different flavors and textures in my meals.
I love video games, the ones I enjoyed the most when I was little were puzzle games but as the years go by I also like shooters, since I consider that each movement is like a movement in chess.
